mean_en: an insect that lives in organized groups, mainly in hot countries. Termites do a lot of damage by eating the wood of trees and buildings.
sentence: When we cut down the tree we saw thousands of termites inside.
sentence_trans: 当我们把那个树砍倒的时候，我们看见了数千只白蚁。
word_etyma: term=termes白蚁，直接来自拉丁文 ＋ ite表示物 → termite白蚁
